name: Eddie calls Johny to play their favorite MMO because he has no ammo
name_original: Eddie calls Johny to play their favorite MMO because he has no ammo
description:
Continuation of the absolute amazing hit! Help Eddie get out of the dungeon because he forgot to take ammo! But before you can do it, rewind the cassette with a pencil (because we are in 2020).

Best experienced in Firefox with a gamepad. Otherwise: WASD - SPACE - ENTER
